title: A Map Development...
body:
So I did some work in paint.net and came out with this.

Apologies for sloppy editing, but I think I've done it. I mean I could be TOTALLY wrong considering the river delta but Targon and that one river fit *suspiciously* well...

So yeah, the Southern Continent?!

EDIT: I LOVE YOU BIO

UPDATED VERSION https://i.imgur.com/MJjT4xw.png

EDIT 2: I know Targon is probably in the wrong place but I can't get it to fit into the central Shurima piece properly. I'm going to need more info.

replies.body:
¿ɐɯᴉɹnɥS
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-22T02:01:36.624+0000)
>
> ¿ɐɯᴉɹnɥS
> {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Aw, fuck....

Welp let's rotate this 180 degrees.

https://i.imgur.com/MJjT4xw.png

Okay.

Now this makes sense.

I freakin' love you Bio.

That peninsula on top... Piltover?!?!?!?

Wow your edit looks pretty solid now. 

Bio's response was pretty great.

So I'm unsure if this has been confirmed or announced, but is there a planed Q&A (or /Dev blog) for when the new map is finally released? 

Because there's a number of cities / landmarks that I'd love to have the developers confirm their location.

> [{quoted}](name=Whyte Lyon,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-07-22T04:24:16.089+0000)
>
> So I'm unsure if this has been confirmed or announced, but is there a planed Q&A (or /Dev blog) for when the new map is finally released? 
> 
> Because there's a number of cities / landmarks that I'd love to have the developers confirm their location.

Well, Creative Dev are doing an AMA on Reddit tomorrow - might be a good place to throw a question or two (or three).

>Riot's Creative Development Team  ---- July 24 at 1pm PST

As someone who doens't like reddit, the only question that matters is " Will AMA ever comeback on board again?".

It was supposed to be a mix of the 2 plateform, but it as been only reddit for nearly 2 year now.
I miss AMA on board, there was a lot of comment on the red traker (exciting), it was easy to find stuff and it wasn't excluding player (find it weird that I'm forced to create an account on a media I don't like to use to ask question about a game I play that have is own community plateform that do the same and is open to all the playerbase with just their ingame log).

Well, the Boards are my primary means of communication with players, and you can bet that I'll be around here to answer questions during and after.  

Reddit seems to be better suited to short, high-intensity, blasts of interaction.  The Boards better for ongoing, lower-intensity, conversations, imo.

just to be clear
what sort of questions will the Creative Devs be able to answer

so never, well that sucks (with all the respect one rioter personnal opinion, while still interesting, isn't on the same level as the whole team in charge of a specific project)

I didn't like behing left behind for camille, xayah, rakan, kayn, ornn, zoe, kai'sa, pyke, ww, galio, urgot, evelynn, swain, irelia, the assassin and the mage only because i'm not a reddit enthusiast, guess akali and the stuff who will follow will be the same then.

> [{quoted}](name=Flemman,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=0001000200010002,timestamp=2018-07-23T18:52:28.275+0000)

> I miss AMA on board, there was a lot of comment on the red traker (exciting), it was easy to find stuff and it wasn't excluding player (find it weird that I'm forced to create an account on a media I don't like to use to ask question about a game I play that have is own community plateform that do the same and is open to all the playerbase with just their ingame log).

Kinda defeats the purpose of the site boards if Rioters primarily use reddit instead.

Oh come on seriously {{sticker:sg-shisa}} 
Why do you torment us with this hype

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=000100020001,timestamp=2018-07-23T17:38:49.842+0000)
>
> Well, Creative Dev are doing an AMA on Reddit tomorrow - might be a good place to throw a question or two (or three).

Question about when release the whole map? Is this still a "question"? It means it will take still time to come out all??{{sticker:sg-janna}}

> [{quoted}](name=Whyte Lyon,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-07-22T04:24:16.089+0000)
>
> So I'm unsure if this has been confirmed or announced, but is there a planed Q&A (or /Dev blog) for when the new map is finally released? 
> 
> Because there's a number of cities / landmarks that I'd love to have the developers confirm their location.

When the actual map comes out, *everything* should be marked on it.

BIo I want you to know, I didn't downvote you because this was unhelpful, I did it so you'd be at 8 again.

So it still works upside down.
How much longer must we wait{{sticker:sg-janna}}
dAMNIT RELEASE IT ALREADY IM GOING MAD

That image looks a lot like ‘Murica.  The east edge has Maine at the top, followed by the Cape, and then Florida.  To the interior of the combined pieces, we see the peaks of the Appalachians followed westward by the flat expanse of the Great Plains and Southwestern desert.  The south edge has tiny versions of the Louisiana and Texas ‘boots,’ and the west edge resembles an inverted West Coast, complete with Rocky Mountains.

Was this country’s geography an inspiration?
I think your placement of Targon might not be completely right. Just shrink it, rotate it and try to merge it with the already existing mountain range on the middle Shuriman map.

Something like this. There are still missing pieces though such as the southern peninsula (seen in the new map summoner icon).

https://imgur.com/a/n532jIx
That seems solid. Good job.
I don't think Targon has been positioned correctly, it should probably be slightly lower.

> [{quoted}](name=Vonler,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-07-22T09:43:13.074+0000)
>
> I think your placement of Targon might not be completely right. Just shrink it, rotate it and try to merge it with the already existing mountain range on the middle Shuriman map.

I already attempted this. It did not work very well.

Targon is definitely out of place, but the other two pieces perfectly fit together.
Good job!

> [{quoted}](name=Whyte Lyon,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-22T02:42:47.485+0000)
>
> As much as the left and centre piece look like they fit together, im doubting thats how it all meets together. At second glance there's a fair few inconsistencies.


> [{quoted}](name=XIII Vanitas,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UjmqX1iA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-07-22T02:43:32.777+0000)
>
> Targon is definitely out of place, but the other two pieces perfectly fit together.
> Good job!

Point taken. Those two parts that fit together do seem quite similar in shape, though, right?

EDIT: I just attempted and failed to place the Targon piece in a better spot. Your move, Riot...?
side note: I actually went and adjusted the colors of the piece on the left to account for different lighting and the result looks a lot closer to everything else. I can upload if you guys want.

Good job cutting the pieces and putting them together (I failed miserably in trying that), but I do not think that is the aspect of the Southern Continent.

Two reasons: 

1) I'm sure **Targon** is out of spot. The orography makes no sense with the mountain range being cut in half and another mountain (Targon's) appearing out of nowhere. I know that Runeterra is a magic world but Riot worldbuilding team seems to be doing a logic work with the map. 

2) I think **the Mother of Life** (according to "[Bloodline](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/rg-shurima-story/)" story that's the name of the great river of Shurima) flows into the sea that separates **Valoran** and **Shurima**. Why? Because when Taliyah disembarks in **Bel'zhun** she heads south to** Kenethet** and in the next paragraph is said _"From Kenethet, she pushed ever south, following the winding arc of what were once again calling the Mother of Life (...)"_

**PD:** You can see where **Bel'zhun** is in the [Medarda's Heirloom](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover/medarda-heirloom)
Hoboy, thats incorrect as heck.
You shoul make the map smaller
